publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3635 Stuart McMillan: Home Reports Boost Buyers’ Interest—That the Parliament welcomes the results of a survey by the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors in Scotland showing that more people are thinking about buying a home as a result of new seller reports; notes that eight out of the 10 largest chartered surveyor firms said that the introduction of home reports had boosted interest in the housing market, and acknowledges that the implementation of home reports by the Scottish Government has helped house buyers to save money and obtain greater peace of mind about the properties that they may wish to purchase. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*
S3M-3635 Home Reports Boost Buyers’ Interest (lodged on 6 March 2009) Rob Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*
S3M-3635 Home Reports Boost Buyers’ Interest (lodged on 6 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3635 Home Reports Boost Buyers’ Interest (lodged on 6 March 2009) Robin Harper*
S3M-3635 Home Reports Boost Buyers’ Interest (lodged on 6 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
